replies.body: What a great way to get people reported>.< Kappa Riot
I already play Urgot top xD, one of my favourite top laners aside from Rumble.
Nasus is alright, but I'm not a big fan on farming champions, makes the early game broing even if you do become godlike lategame.

But that's wat i like about nasus, look at my game:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/83116386/200847413?tab=overview
It's pretty bad my cs, because im not pro, BUT ANYWAY it's probs y i like to go nasus

Haha you call that a good nasus game? damnson.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/87995422/200334949?tab=overview

I consider that an LP average nasus game, and that's smurfing! lol

My game i do consider gud, but urs, well teach me ur ways senpai
BUT I THINK I HAVE A BETTER NASUS GAME (i must check)
We need some more common champions for other roles. Not Like (Urgot-Top, Irelia-Jungle and Brand-Support)

I think the whole point of this is to get the less popular champions a way to shine in the spotlight. I personally think it's a great idea, since I am a bit sick and tired of seeing a Katarina every game.

I went against a top lane Urgot as Kennen just the other day. Was an aids matchup, he ended up getting very strong. We would've won the game however if it wasn't for our hissy-fitting adc (desribes most adcs) who decided to afk at fountain for no apparent reason.
I wonder how many people will go... Urgot, nothing special about this post then
